<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/{camera_name}/{label}/snapshot.jpg"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the snapshot image from the latest event for the given camera and label combo

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"camera_name","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","title":"Camera Name"}},{"name":"label","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","title":"Label"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
